Klasse AnswerDAO_Serializable

java.lang.Object
persistence.DataAccessObject
persistence.serialization.dao.AnswerDAO_Serializable
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Serializable
public class AnswerDAO_Serializable extends DataAccessObject implements Serializable
Serializable Data Access Object (DAO) representing a quiz answer for use with file-based serialization persistence.

This DAO mirrors the functionality of AnswerDAO_MariaDB but is designed for serialization-based storage rather than relational database persistence. It maintains the same interface and validation logic for consistency across storage backends.

Responsibilities:

  • Store answer text, correctness flag, and question association
  • Provide validation for answer content
  • Convert between DAO and DTO representations
  • Support serialization for file-based persistence
Seit:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Autor:
Christos Poulios

  • Konstruktordetails

    • AnswerDAO_Serializable

      public AnswerDAO_Serializable()
      Default constructor for creating a new answer DAO. Initializes with empty text, incorrect flag, and invalid question ID.

    • AnswerDAO_Serializable

      public AnswerDAO_Serializable(int id)
      Constructor for creating an answer DAO with an existing ID.
      Parameter:
      id - the unique identifier of the answer

    • AnswerDAO_Serializable

      public AnswerDAO_Serializable(String text, boolean correct, int questionId)
      Constructor for creating a complete answer DAO.
      Parameter:
      text - the answer text content
      correct - true if this is the correct answer
      questionId - the ID of the associated question
